planning.title: Planejamento de pesquisa
planning.signInToUsePlanning: [AI-NEEDED] Please sign in to use planning
planning.signInRequired: [AI-NEEDED] Please sign in with Google to use the planning feature
planning.authExpired: [AI-NEEDED] Authentication expired. Please sign out and sign in again to continue.
planning.authRequired: [AI-NEEDED] Authentication required. Please sign in with Google to continue.
planning.savePlanTooltip: [AI-NEEDED] Save the current plan to your saved plans list
planning.debugTooltip: [AI-NEEDED] Copy debug info for Copilot troubleshooting
planning.clearAllTooltip: [AI-NEEDED] Clear all planning data and start fresh
planning.systemPromptHelp: [AI-NEEDED] This defines the AI's role and behavior. Edit as needed before transferring to chat.
planning.userQueryHelp: [AI-NEEDED] This is the message that will be sent to the chat. Edit to refine your query.
planning.llmInfoTooltip: [AI-NEEDED] View LLM transparency info (model, tokens, cost)
planning.cannotSavePlan: [AI-NEEDED] Cannot save plan: No valid plan generated
planning.storageWarningHelp: [AI-NEEDED] Consider deleting old plans to free up space.
planning.simpleQueryHelp: [AI-NEEDED] This query can be answered directly without extensive planning.
planning.longFormNote: [AI-NEEDED] Note: This will be built in stages using snippets. Each section will be researched and written separately, then combined into a final document.
planning.updateQueryDetails: [AI-NEEDED] Update your query with more details:
planning.guidanceQuestions: [AI-NEEDED] üí° Please answer these questions to refine your plan:
planning.updatePromptWithAnswers: [AI-NEEDED] Update your research prompt with answers:
planning.guidanceTip: [AI-NEEDED] üí° Tip: Include answers to the questions above in your updated query. The more specific you are, the better the AI can create an effective multi-iteration plan with proper tool usage and few-shot examples.
planning.guidanceExamplePlaceholder:
[AI-NEEDED] Example: I want to build a comprehensive research report on climate change by:
1. Creating 25 todos for different sub-topics (policy, science, economics, etc.)
2. Searching the web for each topic and saving results to snippets
3. Generating charts to visualize key data points
4. Combining all snippets into a master analysis

Please create a detailed plan with few-shot examples showing how to use create_todo, search_web, create_snippet, and generate_chart together in each iteration...
planning.forcePlanTooltip: [AI-NEEDED] Let AI answer the questions and force plan generation
planning.resetTooltip: [AI-NEEDED] Clear guidance mode and return to previous state
planning.guidanceModeHelp: [AI-NEEDED] This mode detects complex projects that require multiple iterations and extensive tool usage. Answer the questions above to help create a detailed execution plan with few-shot examples showing how to use todos, snippets, and multiple tool calls per iteration.
planning.clarificationAnswer: [AI-NEEDED] Please use your best judgment based on the original query.

settings.title: Configura√ß√µes
settings.generalDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Configure general application settings including language and display preferences
settings.languageHelp: [AI-NEEDED] Changes the interface language and instructs the AI to respond in your selected language
settings.providerDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Configure your LLM provider API keys. The backend automatically selects the best model for each request
settings.modelStrategyDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Choose how the system selects models for your requests. This balances cost, quality, and performance
settings.cheapDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Prioritize free providers (Groq, Gemini) and smallest capable models. Falls back to paid providers only when rate-limited. Best for most use cases
settings.balancedDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Choose models that reliably do the job without compromising quality. Uses free tier when quality is equivalent, paid models when quality matters. Balances cost vs. capability
settings.powerfulDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Use the best available models (GPT-4o, Gemini 2.5 Pro, o1) for maximum capability. Prioritizes quality over cost. Uses reasoning models for complex analysis
settings.fastestDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Prioritize low-latency models (Groq) for quick responses. May sacrifice some quality for speed in simple requests. Great for interactive sessions
settings.tavilyHelp: [AI-NEEDED] Enables enhanced web search and scraping via Tavily API. Falls back to DuckDuckGo if not provided
settings.webSearchDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Search the web for current information, news, and articles
settings.executeJsDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Execute JavaScript code for calculations and data processing
settings.scrapeUrlDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Extract content from specific URLs and websites
settings.youtubeDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Search YouTube for videos with transcript support
settings.transcribeDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Convert audio and video files to text transcriptions
settings.chartDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Create visualizations and charts from data
settings.imageDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Create AI-generated images from text descriptions
settings.ragDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Search through uploaded documents and knowledge base
settings.todosDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Create and manage task lists and reminders
settings.snippetsDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Save and retrieve code snippets and text
settings.askLlmDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Delegate sub-questions to other LLM instances
settings.reasoningDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Step-by-step analytical reasoning for complex problems
settings.proxyDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Configure HTTP/HTTPS proxy for web requests
settings.locationDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Use your location for localized search results and region-specific information
settings.locationHelp: [AI-NEEDED] Allows web searches to return locally relevant results

billing.title: Faturamento
billing.clearDataConfirm: [AI-NEEDED] Are you sure you want to clear billing data?
billing.signInToViewBilling: [AI-NEEDED] Please sign in with Google to view your billing data.

billing.signInStep2: [AI-NEEDED] That's it! Your billing data will load automatically
billing.billingDataNote: [AI-NEEDED] üí° Your billing data is stored in a centralized service account Google Sheet and retrieved automatically. No additional permissions or Drive access needed - just sign in with Google.
billing.noBillingData: [AI-NEEDED] No billing data available. Please wait...
billing.startUsingChat: [AI-NEEDED] Start using the chat to generate billing records. All API usage is automatically tracked.
billing.purchaseCreditsDescription: [AI-NEEDED] Purchase credits to use AI features. Minimum purchase: $5.00
billing.tipUseOwnKeys: [AI-NEEDED] üí° Tip: Add your own API keys in Settings for $0 LLM costs! Only infrastructure costs apply when using your own keys.
billing.paypalNotLoaded: [AI-NEEDED] ‚ö†Ô∏è PayPal SDK not loaded. Please refresh the page.
billing.clearDataWarning: [AI-NEEDED] ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This action cannot be undone. Your billing data will be permanently deleted.
billing.clearAllDescription: [AI-NEEDED] This will delete all transactions from your billing sheet.
billing.considerExportFirst: [AI-NEEDED] Consider exporting to CSV first for your records.
billing.clearProviderHint: [AI-NEEDED] Useful for aligning with provider billing cycles (e.g., clear monthly).
billing.clearDateRangeHint: [AI-NEEDED] Leave blank to clear from beginning/to end. Both can be used together.
